feed.title: Bitcoin Contracting Primitives WG 4rd Meeting, Tuesday 21 Feb. 18:00 UTC

entry.title: Bitcoin Contracting Primitives WG 4rd Meeting, Tuesday 21 Feb. 18:00 UTC
entry.summary: Antoine Riard has announced the fourth Bitcoin contracting primitives working group meeting on Tuesday, February 21st at 18:00. The meeting will discuss topics such as ANYPREVOUT / "Eltoo" and setting up an open meatspace event during S2 2023 or S1 2024 to accelerate the development pace of contracting protocols. Participants can propose additional agenda topics in advance through the GitHub issue tracker. The communication venue is #bitcoin-contracting-primitives-wg on Libera Chat IRC. Logs of previous sessions are also available for reference.
